storySteps.title: The Beginning
storySteps.content: Meet Badr Gharib, a ServiceNow Staff Software Engineer with over 12 years of experience in software engineering, including the last 3 years as ServiceNow engineer. Started his journey with a B.Sc. in Computer Science.

storySteps.title: The Journey
storySteps.content: From full-stack development to frontend architecture, Badr has designed and built scalable platforms from scratch, led teams, and mastered cutting-edge technologies including React, Next.js, Redux, and AWS Cloud.

storySteps.title: The Mission
storySteps.content: Now architecting high-performance solutions at ServiceNow, building Retail Applications with ML integration, troubleshooting customer issues, and reviewing peer designs while pushing the boundaries of frontend engineering with micro-frontends and modern design patterns.

timeline.title: Staff Software Engineer
timeline.description: Architect & deliver scalable ServiceNow solutions, build custom modules, flows, APIs, automations, platform extensions and integrations, ARB and Security review. Lead engineering design, reviews, technical decision-making, Mentor developers and enforce coding and platform best practices. Implement and develop the most challenge part in Shape-Toolkit component to make it support accessibility and use keyboard to draw (line, polygon, rectangle), resizing and customizing existing shapes.

timeline.title: Technical Lead Frontend Engineer (React, Redux)
timeline.description: Designing and building the frontend main architecture from scratch to convert PARSIFAL platform from desktop application to React web application, that guaranty the maintainability, scalability, accept any change at any time. Integrating with many different Map systems like Google Map, Cesium 3D map. Build custom 2D image map with zooming and panning. Integrate with Thermal Cameras to stream normal and thermal videos for Covid19 project. Build frontend team and train new comers to follow best practices.

timeline.title: Senior Consultant Engineer
timeline.description: Support the team in refactoring old projects and apply the best practice architecture in new projects.

timeline.title: Technical Leader Software Engineer
timeline.description: Develop web application for New Egyptian Museum, make integration with NEC face recognition algorithm. Integrate Cortana Microsoft's personal digital assistant with home automation. Design and develop semi border control Augmented Reality app on HoloLens Glasses presented at CeBIT 2017. Research and implement prototypes applications at IOT and Augmented Reality.

timeline.title: Software Engineer
timeline.description: Working as full stack developer in many desktop application related to identification systems like Border Control, e-Passport and e-ID. Make integration with many of devices as fingerprint scanner, passport scanner and SDKs.

items.name: React Nanodegree
items.description: Mastered React for building declarative UIs and React Native for iOS & Android development. Learned state management with Redux to create scalable and maintainable applications. Gained career-ready front-end skills through hands-on projects.

items.name: AWS Cloud Developer Nanodegree
items.description: Mastered AWS, cloud architecture, and scalable full-stack deployment, designing microservices with replication and independent scaling. Built serverless applications, secure REST APIs, and deployed complex cloud solutions with best security practices.

items.name: AWS Cloud Architect Nanodegree
items.description: Designed and optimized AWS architectures with network strategies, multi-account management, and cost optimization. Migrated and modernized data processing with Glue, Athena, and built scalable, serverless, event-driven solutions using CloudFormation.

items.name: Advanced Full-Stack Web Development
items.description: CDevelop scalable Node.js backends with Express & TypeScript, secure RESTful APIs, and automated CI/CD deployments using AWS Elastic Beanstalk, CircleCI, and RDS.

items.name: AI Programming with Python Nanodegree
items.description: Develop a strong AI foundation with Python, leveraging NumPy, pandas, and Matplotlib for data analysis. Developed and trained ML models using PyTorch, implementing neural networks, Transformer models, and generative AI for NLP tasks.

items.title: Frontend Architecture Design
items.description: Designed and built scalable frontend architecture from scratch for PARSIFAL platform, ensuring maintainability and flexibility across multiple domains

items.title: Team Leadership & Training
items.description: Built and trained frontend development teams, mentoring new developers in best practices and design patterns

items.title: Innovative Solutions
items.description: Developed cutting-edge solutions including HoloLens AR for border control (presented at CeBIT 2017) and ML-integrated retail applications

items.title: Multi-Domain Expertise
items.description: Successfully delivered solutions across diverse sectors: Security, Retail, Healthcare, Smart Cities, and Government Systems

items.name: ServiceNow Smart-Ops
items.description: Retail Store Automation Platform that addresses multiple retail scenarios such as queue management, empty shelf detection, visitor counting, shopping time analysis, and shopping media insights. It predicts potential issues based on historical data and provides real-time notifications through Kafka. The platform integrates with CSM/FSM to automatically create cases and uses rule-based management to trigger subflows for required actions.

items.name: ServiceNow Shape-Toolkit
items.description: Custom web component used to draw shapes as (line, polygon, rectangle) on camera image and extract coordinates to use by machine learning algorithms.

items.name: Parsifal Platform
items.description: A web-based platform adaptable to various fields like security, retail, and healthcare, processing diverse data sources (video, audio, IoT) and visualizing them through GIS maps, 3D maps, and heat maps. It enhances situational awareness by presenting real-time events, alarms, and insights, helping clients respond with structured action plans.

items.name: Retrofit Project
items.description: A web-based platform for managing vessels, analyzing costs and revenues based on various retrofit modifications. It provides dynamic insights to optimize vessel performance and financial outcomes.

items.name: Covid19 Project
items.description: A web-based system for detecting infected individuals using thermal cameras, streaming both normal and thermal video, and triggering alerts when temperatures exceed a set threshold. It played a key role in safely returning football fans to stadiums during the COVID-19 pandemic.

items.name: Face Recognition Project for Egyptian Grand Museum
items.description: A web-based system for detecting individuals via IP cameras using facial recognition against predefined lists, with real-time notifications upon detection.

items.name: HoloLens AR Border Control
items.description: Augmented Reality application on HoloLens Glasses to capture and match passenger faces, capture and extract passport MRZ. Presented at CeBIT 2017.

items.name: Other Projects
items.description: Border control systems, Video Surveillance platforms, New Mexican passport system, New Dominican passport system.
